title: Maryanne's Chicken with Cheese and Pears
ingredients: ['3 chicken breasts, skinned', '3 slices of parma ham', '60g (2 oz) of feta cheese', 'salt & pepper to season', 'bunch of spring onions', 'teaspoon of fresh grated ginger', '2 firm pears, peeled, cored and cut into quarters', '4 leeks', '1 stick of celery', '300ml (1/2 pint) of chicken stock', 'a little olive oil for sealing', 'a knob of butter']
